can flip the piece over

1377.79.text: I'll apply a total of four coats

1387.01.text: I think I will name him Casper.

1388.56.text:
This project was a lot of
fun, really straight forward.

1392.64.text:
I wouldn't really say that
there's any twists to it

1396.65.text: or anything that's going to surprise you.

1398.64.text: The one thing I will warn you though

1400.04.text: is to be very careful about the thickness.

1402.12.text: If you go too thick on this,

1403.90.text:
most routers will have a
problem extending the bit

1407.62.text: far enough when you plunge down

1409.11.text:
so that you can actually
clean out the bottom.

1411.07.text: I just barely made it with my router

1413.02.text: so I cut it very, very close.

1414.50.text:
It's something I recommend you
sort of look at your router,

1417.49.text: plunge it all the way down

1418.58.text: and just make sure you know how far

1419.95.text: you can get in terms of depth

1423.26.text:
on how thick to go and how
thick to leave the bottom.

1425.74.text: I will mention about the finish here.

1428.81.text:
This water based finish
is fantastic stuff.

1431.24.text:
I've got about four
coats on here in one day.

1433.93.text:
A project like this really
can be a weekend thing.

1437.53.text: You do part of the project,

1441.06.text:
Sunday you can come out
and take care of the finish

1443.77.text: as long as you use a quick drying finish.

1445.55.text: I'm very happy with the results.

1447.65.text: I hope you guys take the time to build one

1453.87.text: I always recommend batching them out.

1455.96.text: If you do one and you show somebody,

1457.96.text: I guarantee you're going to get a request

1461.00.text: You may as well build those to start.

1462.97.text: I've got some of the other templates

1464.57.text:
that I promised some people
already that I'd make.

1466.45.text: I got to get back to work but before I do,

1469.18.text: let's fill this puppy with some candy.

1475.87.text:
Unfortunately it's only 70
to 80 calories per pack.

1479.90.text:
We like the good candy
in the Spagnuolo house,

1483.21.text: For some people this could be a problem,

1486.22.text:
it's still a couple of
weeks before Halloween

1488.20.text:
and you have to sit here
and look at all these

1492.48.text:
but fortunately I have little
thing called self-control.

1538.11.text: I expected this to be much more fun

1546.84.text: Marc:Damn we need a bigger ledge.

1548.10.text: You got to get in there.

1549.57.text:
Nicole:I don't want a
lot, I just put makeup on.

1555.92.text:
I mean clearly you have
much more experience

1557.88.text: spreading chocolate on people than I do.
